name: Cubesnap
description:
Cubesnap is a fun cube racing game. Race against bots and try to reach the finish line first. Crazy tracks and pleasing visuals will definitely keep you engaged. If you are running this game for the first time, please wait for a short time before the game boots up. Thanks for playing :)

This game is currently under development right now, so if there is any thing you'll like me to add please mention it in the comments!

CONTROLS:

A - Move left

D- Move right
